<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>false</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>x_526765_reisemngr_reisekostenabrechnung</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition table="x_526765_reisemngr_reisekostenabrechnung">statusCHANGESTO4^EQ<item display_value="Abgeschlossen" endquery="false" field="status" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="CHANGESTO" or="false" value="4"/> <item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/> </filter_condition> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Status auf abgerechnet</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) { gs.addInfoMessage(current.auftragsnummer.status); current.auftragsnummer.status = 5; gs.addInfoMessage(current.auftragsnummer.status);
/*var gr = new GlideRecord("x_526765_reisemngr_reiseantrag"); gr.addQuery("auftragsnummer", current.auftragsnummer); gr.query(); while (gr.next()) { gs.addInfoMessage('hallo'+ 'd'+ gr.status +'c'+ gs.status); gr.setValue("status", 5); gr.update(); gs.addInfoMessage('hallo'+ 'd'+ gr.status +'c'+ gs.status); } gs.addInfoMessage('hallo'+ 'd'+ gr.status +'c'+ gs.status); */ })(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-09-15 10:23:38</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>e5b91a412f1bd0106fb0de1a2799b603</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Status auf abgerechnet</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Reisemanager" source="x_526765_reisemngr">123a61692f4790106fb0de1a2799b6fc</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Reisemanager">123a61692f4790106fb0de1a2799b6fc</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_e5b91a412f1bd0106fb0de1a2799b603</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-09-15 16:25:25</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>after</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=e5b91a412f1bd0106fb0de1a2799b603"/> </record_update>
